caption:
Introducing the limited edition TRIO AU CHOCOLAT 🖤🤎🤍😋🍫🥐 ~ A very special twist on the classic Pain Au Chocolat @connaughtpatisserie ~ created by the pastry magician 🪄 @nicolasrouzaud in collaboration with my dear friend @millykr to celebrate the launch of her new book Britain's Best Bakeries by @hoxtonminipress

Meticulously constructed with a secret method than ensures the perfect shape and elegant trio of stripes which represents the ensemble of chocolate inside - dark, white and gianduja (milk + hazelnut) from Villars Chocolate (the Swiss chocolate brand from Vahlrona). 🍫

We were lucky enough to join @nicolasrouzaud in the kitchen to learn how to make this masterpiece.

Available exclusively and in limited quantities daily from @theconnaughtpatisserie from today, 16th May 😋🥐🍫

TAG a friend who'd love this! 🖤🤎🤍

#painauchocolat #croissant #chocolate #baking #bakery #london #mayfair #chocolat
